website_summaries.verdict: With its lightweight design and comfortable feel, the Under Armour Speedfit 2.0 is not hard to love. The boot’s anatomically molded fit and breathable upper were also generally well-received by outdoor junkies. The gear, however, allows debris to easily enter its interior, causing a little bit of annoyance during a hike. Nevertheless, the Speedfit 2.0 from Under Armour is a worthy choice for hikers for its set of positive qualities.
pros: The majority was enamored with the Under Armour Speedfit 2.0’s lightness
Droves of Under Armour Speedfit 2.0 users appreciated how comfortable this footgear was
Several wearers gave positive remarks about this hiker’s glove-like fit
Its breathability was commendable, according to some buyers
This hiking shoe impressed about a handful of purchasers with its amazing aesthetics
Based on a few consumer reviews, this Under Armour product gripped well on wet and dry surfaces
cons: Some outdoor enthusiasts were irked with how easy dirt and debris entered the Under Armour Speedit 2.0’s tongue

customer_reviews.title: Love them...
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight boots with a perfect fit. I bought these for competitions and they work, very comfortable and breathable. I even got cought in a heavy down pour and got soaked and I stayed comfortable and they dried out fast.
customer_reviews.author: DV Kanada

customer_reviews.title: Good design, less is more
customer_reviews.text: I have a few different pairs of hiking boots - for different conditions and ease of travel, not every pair of boots fits comfortably in a carry-on! I expected these to be good for paved areas but they have proved themselves in tougher environments. They have done a fair-few miles and are still in good condition. I would buy another pair when these finally wear out.
customer_reviews.author: BubblySchmubbly

customer_reviews.title: Execellent high speed performance hiking/running boot
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lightweight high performance hiking boot. I like the way the the ergonomic design is molded and locks around my ankle and heel giving a very stable feel. I use these in a tactical environment and have had to run and chase dirtbags down and they are fast and comfortable. Only issue is if you lace the top too tight, the top material edge will bite into your ankles a bit. Love these boots.
customer_reviews.author: DMac

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, however you definitely want to order one ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, however you definitely want to order one size bigger. My smaller toes were rubbing the top of the boot and couldn’t wear them more than an hour. Sad because they look sharp and are otherwise very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn K.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. I bought these for desert hiking
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I bought these for desert hiking, rock face scaling, and they did not disappoint. When I got them from Amazon, I immediately put them on and just waked around the house to check the comfort, and they where surprisingly pleasing. I have some minor joint issues, but the design gave me enough support to wear them all day. and they look good
customer_reviews.author: MadOnez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but the laces suck!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are amazing, light and great for wearing in my soft uniform and bike uniform. Unfortunately the laces suck and I can't seem to find a pair thin and strong enough to work in them!
customer_reviews.author: Matt McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to order your true size.
customer_reviews.text: Under Armour Men's Speedfit 2.0 Hiking Boot is a good fit if you order your true fit size, at least in my case. I ordered a size up and had to re-order my true fit size. I really like this product and think it is going to be a durable boot for my purposes, not tested in hard terrain yet, but so far I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Borider

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have enough mileage on these to give a long term review on durability, but they're very good right out of the box. Breathable, but probably not ideal for hot weather. Excellent traction, A+ for comfort and weight. Don't wear them with no show socks, you'll end up with raw ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca E Sullins

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe and great air flow/movement through shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these for work shoes. They have been great and have helped him with having air movement/flow through his shoes. He hasn't had any issues with breaking out like he was having.
customer_reviews.author: B. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boot. Very light use it for work, even though the are hiking boots, comfortable. But not for rough work use them on my light day when I did a lot of walking.
customer_reviews.author: lito

customer_reviews.title: Appear to be as adverstised
customer_reviews.text: These boots were on my son's Christmas list. I can't speak to the fit as he has not tried them on yet, but they do appear exactly as described and illustrated by the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Reed

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels good !
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and feels good !! Great hiking shoe, light as a feather. They aren’t waterproof but good for nice trail hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Boots fit and feel great! The tongue gets a little bunched up after you lace them up. About a month after wearing these boots, the tongue began to tear on both boots. In the same exact spot! Very poorly made!
customer_reviews.author: xjack30

customer_reviews.title: Good boots for helicopter flying
customer_reviews.text: This are the new speedfit hike 2.0, just got release, good boots for helicopter flying, got on amazon on january 20th. If your looking for style, comfort and feet support this are the ones, just order 1 size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Reynaldo S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great looking hiking shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband. This shoes are looking great, super comfortable, fashionable and practical. I wish they have version for women, coz will definitely get one for myself! Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes. I get compliments every time I wear them. I’ve not seen another pair anywhere on anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Upshaw

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit me perfectly because I have somewhat of a narrow foot as all under armor boots they fit me really nice and they look great with jeans or sweatpants or any occasion
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Byler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots. Wrap around feel. Keeps feet cool. I use with compression socks. I double knot because single seems to be too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Yovani Tzib

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Very comfortable. Wear them at work every day. Held up well
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dornquast

customer_reviews.title: Luxury + Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This pair is unique. Light plus comfortable and provides fill arch support. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: ZEN MONK

customer_reviews.title: Light, but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very light, but narrow, no ankle support and no cushion, will rub your ankles
customer_reviews.author: JHelper

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Use this product for work. I do a lot of walking at my job and the boots feel very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love how they look/ very comfortable and lite weight nice
customer_reviews.author: joseph jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fits
customer_reviews.text: Much needed for my husband who does a lot of work outdoors. Fits as expected
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: They're Narrow
customer_reviews.text: The look and feel of the boots was outstanding. unfortunately I have a wide foot. About halfway down the boot it get a bit to narrow for comfort. Id still recommend the boots to whomever has the feet to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour on point with these!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Working EMS comfortable footwear is a must. These 2.0 are on point. Esp if you work for a company where polished shoes isnt a much. Feel like running shoes comfortable to wear 16 plus hour and best part NO FOOT SWEAT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: They are nice
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a comfortable boot pretty stylish too would never consider this a boot for a real job site more like warehouse/ athletics
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARNING !!! They are fake !!
customer_reviews.text: 203.81 Dls Really bad shoes !! too expensive for not be original.. and wrong size . Really bad customer service ! don't buy her .
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best boots
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for about a month. They do not feel like boots in any way. They look and feel like some cross trainers. Very light and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Benavides

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Fits like a glove. Literally! I like my shoes with a bit of room. So if you do an half size above your normal shoe size will help. Wonderful shoe though 😊
customer_reviews.author: chrisc

customer_reviews.title: Good looks, Bad performance.
customer_reviews.text: These UA boots make my knees hurt, no wonder they aren't in store! They look good but perform badly.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN JIMENEZ

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: True to size. I wear a size 10 and they fit perfectly. Very light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: They look and feel awesome on your feet
customer_reviews.text: They are slightly big but are awesome boots I love them
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all
customer_reviews.text: Not happy about ten at all been using for about 2 months Monday through Friday at work the top front part already ripped on one of the shoes considering I drive a semi truck I don’t do a lot of walking with them very disappointed for the price
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Caballero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have UA sneakers and this boot fits exactly the same 10.5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size, water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for lightweight hiking shoes/boot. When the guy said they were good for flying helicopters, I figured there were worth a try. My First pair of Under Armor's. Prob one of my favorite pair of footwear I've ever owned. Don't know how they hold up to the elements. Jogged in them a couple miles on a rainy day and they kept my feet dry, even after running through a few puddles on road. Might wear them on my summit attempt on Mt.Whitney this September, depends on the weather. Not cheap, but not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Roush

customer_reviews.title: The boots were really comfortable, however they did not repel water in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The boots were really comfortable, however they did not repel water in the slightest bit. I splashed less than a hand full of water on them and it took a day for them to dry. If there is 0% chance of water being involved, these would be great. Unfortunately, that is never the situation for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pjgint

customer_reviews.title: It should be very cool in summer heat which is what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Still figuring out what I think about shoe. Extremely different type of boot. Very form fit and extremely light. It should be very cool in summer heat which is what I wanted. If it holds up it will be a perfect 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Hate the NFL

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Speedfit 2.0 Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: Lightweight & breathable synthetic & textile upper. Anatomically molded upper for enhanced fit. Welded forefoot overlay for protection. Molded tongue & vamp for adaptable fit, comfort & breathability. TPU toe cap for added durability & protection. External welded heel overlays for stability & protection. Molded Ortholite anti-microbial sockliner to prevent the growth of odor-causing microbes. ESS rock plate for protection, stability & incredible support. Lightweight EVA midsole for optimal cushioning. High traction rubber lug outsole for enhanced grip on a variety of surfaces. Weight: 11.04 oz.
feature_bullets: Anatomically molded upper for enhanced fit
Molded tongue & vamp for adaptable fit, comfort & breathability
TPU toe cap for added durability & protection
